languages.text: "Комморра... Этот город перемалывает волю сильнейших и истязает любого, кто попал в его сети. Глупцы здесь гибнут первыми, ну а те, кто оказался прозорливей... Все равно сгинут следом. Я здесь впервые, но немногим {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Детям Азуриана{/g} удавалось покинуть Темный город, не лишившись части души. Так что же ты хочешь узнать?"

traits.locale_text: "Комморра... Этот город перемалывает волю сильнейших и истязает любого, кто попал в его сети. Глупцы здесь гибнут первыми, ну а те, кто оказался прозорливей... Все равно сгинут следом. Я здесь впервые, но немногим {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Детям Азуриана{/g} удавалось покинуть Темный Город, не лишившись части души. Так что же ты хочешь узнать?"
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Commorragh... This city grinds down the will of the strong and torments any who get tangled in its dark web. The fools are the first to die, and the shrewd... perish regardless. I have never been here before, but few {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Children of Asuryan{/g} manage to escape the Dark City without surrendering a part of their soul. So what is it that you wish to know?"
languages.original_text: "Комморра... Этот город перемалывает волю сильнейших и истязает любого, кто попал в его сети. Глупцы здесь гибнут первыми, ну а те, кто оказался прозорливей... So what is it that you wish to know?"

languages.text: “科摩罗……这座城市会消磨强者的意志，折磨所有被它的黑暗之网缠住的人。那些愚蠢的人会最先丧命，而那些精明的人……到最后一样会消亡。我之前从来没来过这里，但若是想逃出黑暗之城，几乎没有哪位{g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}阿苏焉的子嗣{/g}不必付出部分灵魂的代价。既然如此，你想知道些什么事情呢？”
languages.original_text: "Commorragh... This city grinds down the will of the strong and torments any who get tangled in its dark web. The fools are the first to die, and the shrewd... perish regardless. I have never been here before, but few {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Children of Asuryan{/g} manage to escape the Dark City without surrendering a part of their soul. So what is it that you wish to know?"

traits.locale_text: “科摩罗……这座城市会消磨强者的意志，折磨所有被它的黑暗之网缠住的人。那些愚蠢的人会最先丧命，而那些精明的人……到最后一样会消亡。我之前从来没来过这里，但若是想逃出黑暗之城，几乎没有哪位{g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}阿苏焉的子嗣{/g}不必付出部分灵魂的代价。既然如此，你想知道些什么事情呢？”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.original_text: "Commorragh... This city grinds down the will of the strong and torments any who get tangled in its dark web. The fools are the first to die, and the shrewd... perish regardless. I have never been here before, but few Children of Asuryan manage to escape the Dark City without surrendering a part of their soul. So what is it that you wish to know?"

languages.text: «Commorragh... Esta ciudad aplasta la voluntad de los más fuertes y tormenta a todos los que quedan atrapados en su red oscura. Los necios son los primeros en morir, mientras que los astutos... caen igualmente. Nunca antes había estado aquí, pero pocos {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}hijos de Asuryan{/g} consiguen escapar de la Ciudad Siniestra sin perder parte de su alma. Dicho eso, ¿qué es lo que quieres saber?».
languages.original_text: "Commorragh... This city grinds down the will of the strong and torments any who get tangled in its dark web. The fools are the first to die, and the shrewd... perish regardless. I have never been here before, but few {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Children of Asuryan{/g} manage to escape the Dark City without surrendering a part of their soul. So what is it that you wish to know?"

traits.locale_text: «Commorragh... Esta ciudad aplasta la voluntad de los más fuertes y tormenta a todos los que quedan atrapados en su red oscura. Los necios son los primeros en morir, mientras que los astutos... caen igualmente. Nunca antes había estado aquí, pero pocos {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}hijos de Asuryan{/g} consiguen escapar de la Ciudad Siniestra sin perder parte de su alma. Dicho eso, ¿qué es lo que quieres saber?».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「コモラフ…この街は強者の意志を砕き、その暗黒の網に絡まった者を苦しめる。愚か者は真っ先に死に、抜け目のない者も関係なく滅びる。我はここに来たことはないが、{g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}アシュリアンの御子ら{/g}で、魂の一部を明け渡すことなく仄暗き都から脱出できた者はほとんどいない。それで、何が知りたいのだ？」
languages.original_text: "Commorragh... This city grinds down the will of the strong and torments any who get tangled in its dark web. The fools are the first to die, and the shrewd... perish regardless. I have never been here before, but few {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Children of Asuryan{/g} manage to escape the Dark City without surrendering a part of their soul. So what is it that you wish to know?"

traits.locale_text: 「コモラフ…この街は強者の意志を砕き、その暗黒の網に絡まった者を苦しめる。愚か者は真っ先に死に、抜け目のない者も関係なく滅びる。我はここに来たことはないが、{g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}アシュリアンの御子ら{/g}で、魂の一部を明け渡すことなく仄暗き都から脱出できた者はほとんどいない。それで、何が知りたいのだ？」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Commorragh ... Diese Stadt zerfrisst den Willen der Starken und quält jeden, der sich in ihrem dunklen Netz verheddert. Die Narren sterben als Erstes, und die Klugen ... sterben dennoch. Ich war noch nie hier, doch nur wenigen {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Kindern von Asuryan{/g} gelingt es, aus der Dunklen Stadt zu entkommen, ohne einen Teil ihrer Seele aufzugeben. Was wünscht Ihr also zu wissen?"
languages.original_text: "Commorragh... This city grinds down the will of the strong and torments any who get tangled in its dark web. The fools are the first to die, and the shrewd... perish regardless. I have never been here before, but few {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Children of Asuryan{/g} manage to escape the Dark City without surrendering a part of their soul. So what is it that you wish to know?"

traits.locale_text: "Commorragh ... Diese Stadt zerfrisst den Willen der Starken und quält jeden, der sich in ihrem dunklen Netz verheddert. Die Narren sterben als Erstes, und die Klugen ... sterben dennoch. Ich war noch nie hier, doch nur wenigen {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Kindern von Asuryan{/g} gelingt es, aus der Dunklen Stadt zu entkommen, ohne einen Teil ihrer Seele aufzugeben. Was wünscht Ihr also zu wissen?"
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « Commorragh... Cette ville réduit à néant la volonté des plus forts et tourmente quiconque se retrouve pris dans sa sombre toile. Les imbéciles sont les premiers à mourir, puis vient le tour de ceux qui se croyaient plus malins. C'est la première fois que je viens ici, mais je sais que quelques {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}enfants d'Asuryan{/g} ont réussi à s'échapper de la Cité Crépusculaire sans renoncer à une partie de leur âme. Que souhaitez-vous savoir, exactement ? »
languages.original_text: "Commorragh... This city grinds down the will of the strong and torments any who get tangled in its dark web. The fools are the first to die, and the shrewd... perish regardless. I have never been here before, but few {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Children of Asuryan{/g} manage to escape the Dark City without surrendering a part of their soul. So what is it that you wish to know?"

traits.locale_text: « Commorragh... Cette ville réduit à néant la volonté des plus forts et tourmente quiconque se retrouve pris dans sa sombre toile. Les imbéciles sont les premiers à mourir, puis vient le tour de ceux qui se croyaient plus malins. C'est la première fois que je viens ici, mais je sais que quelques {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}enfants d'Asuryan{/g} ont réussi à s'échapper de la Cité Crépusculaire sans renoncer à une partie de leur âme. Que souhaitez-vous savoir, exactement ? »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Commorragh... Bu şehir; güçlülerin iradesini bastırır, karanlık ağlarına takılıp kalanlara eziyet eder. İlk ölecekler ahmaklardır, kurnazlarsa... Her hâlükârda yitip gitmeye mahkûmlardır. Buraya daha önce ayak basmamıştım. Fakat {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Asuryan'ın Çocukları{/g} arasından pek azı, ruhlarının bir parçasından feragat etmeden Kara Şehir'den kaçmayı başarabilir. Pekâlâ, ne bilmek istiyorsun?"
languages.original_text: "Commorragh... This city grinds down the will of the strong and torments any who get tangled in its dark web. The fools are the first to die, and the shrewd... perish regardless. I have never been here before, but few {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Children of Asuryan{/g} manage to escape the Dark City without surrendering a part of their soul. So what is it that you wish to know?"

traits.locale_text: "Commorragh... Bu şehir, güçlülerin iradesini bastırarak karanlık ağlarına takılıp kalanlara eziyet eder. İlk ölecekler ahmaklardır, kurnazlarsa... Her hâlükârda yitip gitmeye mahkûmlardır. Buraya daha önce ayak basmamıştım ama {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Asuryan'ın Çocukları{/g} arasından pek azı, ruhlarının bir parçasından feragat etmeden Kara Şehir'den kaçmayı başarabilir. Pekâlâ, ne bilmek istiyorsun?"
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
